title: Charles Kelley Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Charles Kelley Tickets for his 2015-16 ‘The Driver’ Tour Dates for Cities like Cleveland, Charlotte, and New Orleans
text:
Charles Kelley concert tickets for his 2015-16 tour dates are on sale now for cities like Cleveland, Charlotte, and New Orleans Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Charles Kelley fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a vast selection of Charles Kelley concert tickets at affordable prices. Charles Kelley is hitting the road in 2015-16 and kicking it all off on November 28th in Cleveland, OH at the House of Blues.
Charles Kelly (lead singer from Lady Antebellum) will be out in support of his new album, The Driver. He promises to play some of the Lady A’s hits but is primarily pushing his new album.
Maren Morris will be on for support.
